summary: A bookshop under the bridge NE of Largashbur (and a few clumsy books written by its owner).
descriptionHtml:
[b]Laurence the Stern[/b] is an Orc bookseller who has a camp under the bridge NE of Largashbur, on the road west from Riften.

He sells books from leveled lists (LItemBooks0All to LItemBooks4All), so books added to these lists by mods such as "Books Books Books" or "Book Covers Skyrim - Lost Library" will be available (if you use those mods).

He has also written several silly, clumsy books of his own, but has so far been unable to find a willing publisher. His manuscripts are scattered about the place.

You can have a few short conversations with the man and/or say hello to his horse.
[line]
[b]Resources:[/b]
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14134]OpenBooks Resource[/url] by Blary
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16525]Modder's Resource Pack[/url] by Oaristys and Tony67
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53022]Jokerine's Misc Resources[/url] by Jokerine
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62954]Dwemer Shelves Resource[/url] by Nostromo79
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68755]Modder's Resource Pack - The Witcher Extension[/url] by Oaristys
[url=https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/77097]The Witcher 3 Mega Resource Pack[/url] by LorSakyamuni
[url=http://en.uesp.net/wiki/Main_Page]UESP[/url] (information about alchemy/ingredients)

[b]Tools:[/b] Creation Kit, TES5Edit, NifSkope, Optimizer Textures (Ordenador), BSAopt, Unfuzer, Audacity, Fuz-Extractor
author: ill_litter_rat

files.name: Laurence's Bookshop
files.changelogHtml:
-- a few tiny fixes & edits
-- a bit more clutter, several more idle markers
-- added a few short dialogues
-- Laurence now also buys ingredients, and he has a bit more money
-- gave him some perks, changed his max level to 60

files.name: Laurence's Bookshop
files.changelogHtml:
-- doubles the amount of dialogue and idle lines - he now talks to himself (he used to only grumble)
-- Ostap (the horse) set to "unique", removed his "respawn" flag
-- added relationships: Laurence is Ostap's friend and Yamarz's rival
-- changed a word in a book, 2x
-- put a note in Laurence's pocket (a clue to why he's wearing TG armour)
-- slightly lifted 2 items that would sometimes fall through the desk

files.name: Laurence's Bookshop
files.changelogHtml:
-- fixed a keyword that made him sell his super secret note (oops)
-- removed a word from a dialogue option
